website_summaries.verdict: A deluxe knife bag that is proven to be a cut above many comparable options.
pros: Includes 18 double-stitched interior pockets and 5 exterior zippered pockets
Fits various sizes of knives and utensils
Bag holds its shape over time
cons: Zippers tend to tear from the seams

customer_reviews.title: Do your knives a favor
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best knife case for a serious knife and tool enthusiast! If anything I would like to see the fabric be made water resistant or even water proof in the future. But as for storage I give it 10/10, and protection I happily give this a 9/10. If you have saya for your knives (sheathes that actually protect the entire blade) then you have absolutlely NOTHING to worry about. Do yourself the favor and buy one; I'm honestly planning to buy another one or two of these for my fellow chefs in the kitchen just because every chef should have one without question.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Rudolph Harrison

customer_reviews.title: This bag is great. Will fit 270mm gyuto with saya and 300mm ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great. Will fit 270mm gyuto with saya and 300mm yanagiba with edgeguard (though, would probably fit the 300mm with a saya, too, depending on how large the saya is). Lots of room, very durable and well made, except for the strap. Just get a high quality strap from the hardware store or salvage one from an old knife bag. Seriously, this is the most well made knife bag I've owned in my life. It fits so much stuff, and you never feel like your expensive knives are getting banged around or abused. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: A. G.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny, a little more up front will earn years of returns on this fantastic bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is around $100.00 more than the others "just" like it, but they are not. I have been dragging around knife bags, cases, rolls etc for over 30 years, and I expect this one will be the last one I buy. Steel zippers, heavy canvas construction, lots of space and a dozen or more knives inside make this the perfect solution for serious Chefs and Cooks. Thanks for building a product that works as hard as I do. Glen G.
customer_reviews.author: Glen G.

customer_reviews.title: Liked the first one so much
customer_reviews.text: Liked the first one so much, bought a second one as a gift. Sturdy, lots of room for knives and other tools.
customer_reviews.author: Shannyn

customer_reviews.title: D@mn zippers!
customer_reviews.text: A few friends at work have this style bag and I liked the storage capacity and easy access to tools and knives. Working in fast paced kitchens you need to be able grab and go so the idea of only pulling a zipper to get equipment out is awesome. Unfortunately when I received this bag a zipper pulls was missing, completely closing off an entire pocket. I returned that bag and ordered another, the next bag had the zipper pulls on, but upon pulling the zipper closed it came right off. I'm not that hard to please, but this is not acceptable quality for the $100 cost
customer_reviews.author: jrrowell81

customer_reviews.title: Love This Bag
customer_reviews.text: Fits all my knives and tools, everything doesn't move around loosely, seems very durable. Highly recommend for professional cook/chef.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J. Nakhla

customer_reviews.title: Best Knife Bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag in 2014 due to my growing amount of knives coming out of culinary school. This fits so many knives and various tools and it is comfortable to carry on my shoulder even when it got very heavy with all of my equipment. I am purchasing this bag again because my current ultimate edge is having issues with it's zippers which broke. I can't use one of my sections because I can't zip it up. Four years of heavy use is a lot of time and I am excited to keep using this bag.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Well built and strong knife bag
customer_reviews.text: The bag is built strong and sturdy. If i had to find something wrong, it would be that the bag need to be a little wider so the my knives have a little more space. Some of my bigger knives overlap in the bag. Nut i am just being fussy
customer_reviews.author: Darryl A Granger

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Chef Bag
customer_reviews.text: It's so perfect, I loved it because of the quality of the product. Whoever invented this bag, congratulations for you. Cause I would highly recommend this to my co workers, friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Jhezsaboo

customer_reviews.title: In the bag
customer_reviews.text: I'm an amateur and weekend warrior who loves to dabble in cooking. I've gone to several houses of friends to cook and I find their knives and kitchen gear to be either subpar or simply lacking. So, my solution is to bring as much of the usual things I use and this bag has enough room to bring along my essentials. And while on the road and being a guest in someone else's kitchen, I get to use my own gear. It's the best of many worlds.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoor Enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for a professional Chef, lots of room and great build. Maybe a little much for a newbie but if you’re in The Biz it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Mau

customer_reviews.title: Great bag but zippers are weak
customer_reviews.text: It would have been 5 stars but the tab on one of the zippers broke 3rd day of use. Also the zipper on the outside shallow long pocket will come apart if I put anything other than the shoulder strap in it. These are minor and fixable issues if you know a good seamstress. Other than that, this is the most functional bag I’ve owned after 21 years in kitchens.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Best Bag Ever
customer_reviews.text: YEars later still 100% and this bad boy has done some travelling. Hold a lot of stuff. So much that I sometimes forget whats in there. Great bag
customer_reviews.author: Tony T.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag I am professional hands on chef. This bag I had for a year definitely expands with you. Good quality
customer_reviews.author: Unbias Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad zippers! 😡
customer_reviews.text: The reason why I gave this bag a 1 star rating is because that the zipper broke! I've had this bag for less than a year and the zipper gave out😩. Other than that this bag holds a ton of tools. I was not expecting that it would break because it cost about $100😡 So disappointed. I should have spent an extra $40 and got a leather chef bag instead. So people that a looking to buy this bag... don't. Spend that extra $ and get a leather one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for knives and some other stuff
customer_reviews.text: The knife bag supplied by my culinary school was falling apart, so I looked for a spacious replacement bag. I found it here. It had oodles of space for my knives and good compartments for the itty-bitty tools that always flap about. The only down-side is that the profile is still relatively narrow. It's almost impossible for to store a whisk in there of any size without impeding on available closing-space. (Full disclosure: I have two whisks, a 7" and a 12" balloon. The bag has some difficulty closing with the smaller one in.) I'm very happy with my purchase and have no regret other than it couldn't hold as much as I needed it to.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Tartaglia

customer_reviews.title: Storage!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE it! Lots of room for my knives as well as permanent markers, tongs, etc. It’s the best one I’ve seen
customer_reviews.author: Ben McCollum

customer_reviews.title: Yeah, babe. It's for real.
customer_reviews.text: Best knife bag out there. It can hold a ton of knives and gadgets, looks friggin awesome and folds open like a sleek-ass briefcase (not like those junky knife rolls everyone used to use in the before times). Well worth every dime and everyone in my kitchen wants to know where to find them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the professional chef
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted a new bag, since hers was falling apart. The only thing I could say that needs improving on this is that I wish it were a bit more roomier. She still has to carry 2 bags to carry all of her things
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those who have/use a big assortment of knives
customer_reviews.text: I cook and butcher for a living, so knives are a part of my everyday tools... I take very good care of them and this was the next logical step from my last knife roll. (I outgrew that one). The first 2 zipper sections have elastic sections for knives to be held in place, while they hold well, some of them are pretty small to fit some of the handles of knives that I have. The 3rd zipper section has mesh compartments for extra tools (Scissors, thermometers, etc) on the front there are some pouches for extra, small tools, markers/pens, etc. So far, it's held up beautifully, and I have very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Noely D

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a bag that will work for pastry chefs and bakers!
customer_reviews.text: As a pastry chef, I have a collection of oddly shaped tools and small gadgets. This case does the best job yet of keeping them organized and secure. I do have one confectioner's knife that is too long to fit in a slot but there is enough room to angle it and still zip closed. In thirty plus years, I've had several knife bags. I am far happier with this bag than any other I have ever had!
customer_reviews.author: Becky S.

customer_reviews.title: Chef that loves it
customer_reviews.text: Uses it daily for carrying kitchen tools to and from work as banquet chef. Super durable and lovea the storage.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Great knife bag
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband. He really likes it and has used it for over 3 years. Plenty of room for all his knives and easy to bring with where ever he is catering.
customer_reviews.author: clkrebs

customer_reviews.title: the ultimate edge 2001 knife case
customer_reviews.text: I love this case it is well make and it hold a lot of stuff
customer_reviews.author: pineapple 01

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bag tons of space
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bag, fits all my tools and then some. Including my 12in yanigaba. Its easy to keep organized. The only drawback is the knives tend to slide a bit, a simple band would help. And while the price seems a bit steap i am glad i pulled the trigger and got this bag.
customer_reviews.author: ed santiago

customer_reviews.title: The zippered compartments have easy access pockets with elastic openings to hold tools in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd case I've purchased. The 1st lasted me 3 years with frequent heavy use. It's a solid product that is reliably durable. The zippered compartments have easy access pockets with elastic openings to hold tools in place and are protected by velcro anchored flaps. Its 3rd compartment has zippered pockets that are made of mesh netting for loose items. The netting allows for quick and easy location of items.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Traveling Chefs Kit
customer_reviews.text: Excellent construction. Zippers are a little stiff. I believe the design could be improved by having the compartment on one side having increased depth to allow comfortable storage of tools that are not flat, e.g. a spoon or whisk.
customer_reviews.author: Old Sea Dog

customer_reviews.title: BOY was he happy! He said he walked in the kitchen showing ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a Chef in the Fountain Blue in Miami FL.. BOY was he happy! He said he walked in the kitchen showing it off to all the others. According to him. GREAT PRODUCT!!! According to me Great Price.
customer_reviews.author: Bostic

customer_reviews.title: Great Product & Durable
customer_reviews.text: I work in a kitchen on a daily basis, preparing food in elegant ways. But, you need the tools to do it, and the place to store them to have them readily available. This is the best Knife Bag I have owned yet. Lots of compartment space in the front, and in the 3rd zipper opening. I also enjoy that in the knife sections that there is already a built in protective divider. It also gives the option to hold bigger knives (4 Slots) and smaller knives (5 slots) in both the 1st and 2nd kipper openings. A chef of mine had one; so when my roll-up bag was falling apart, I chose this one. Very Satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Swicegood

customer_reviews.title: Zippers are not up to the task.
customer_reviews.text: The external zippers SUCK on this bag. If your bag is slightly full, this is what happens. Do not get this canvas bag. Get the other ones if you must but this waxed canvas bag should not be purchased until the zippers are replaced with better ones.
customer_reviews.author: Miles Quenton

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a favor. GET THIS ONE !!!
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best ever period. I spent a lot of time looking for the best knife case and I found it. It carries everything you need and then some. Plus it looks incredible and is extremely durable. If you want to waste your money buy something else. If you want the best here it is.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Wayne Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for work works well looks great and everyone in the kitchen once one
customer_reviews.author: Steven Clymer

customer_reviews.title: Super nice bag
customer_reviews.text: Super nice bag, I give 4 because it's a bit heavy. I love the pockets outside the bag where you can put your pen or phones in it. You will look like a professional cook with this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Vien

customer_reviews.title: Stores knives neatly
customer_reviews.text: Really well made, and very happy I got it. Just wish I could take their logo off it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M

customer_reviews.title: Hell ya of a buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag for years ago for my wife she still using it still looks brand new she absolutely loves it would highly recommend it and I would buy more of these
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the one!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a lot of knives and you care about them, this is the bag to get. It has slots for 18 knives. It can accommodate full-sized bread knives, and steels. It has ample additional storage inside and out for utensils, thermometers, pens, etc. Whether you carry your knives with you to work, or just want to store you knives safely at home, this is the bag for you.
customer_reviews.author: uchi deshi

customer_reviews.title: Product is great but the shippment a bit of a wait
customer_reviews.text: Product is great but the shippment a bit of a wait. My knives fit perfectly, notebook, lots of pens, cooking accesories, bar of sharpening stones and rags. The product is well built although the straps get on the way when you unzip..no big deal though I just take it off. Pricey but worth every $
customer_reviews.author: -Chief_Chowmein-

customer_reviews.title: Great large bag.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. I'm excited to use it when I go to my families house for the holidays. They always have terrible cooking tools, so I need to bring my own!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Knife bag for the working chef/cook
customer_reviews.text: Durable and almost fits everything I need,.........almost!!! Great value compared to most of those waxed roll ups which hold very little
customer_reviews.author: Block

customer_reviews.title: Simply awesome!
customer_reviews.text: As a personal chef and caterer, it's so nice to have a sturdy, organized case to not only hold my knives, but pretty much every implement I need to prepare a dinner in a strangers kitchen. Tons of space, rugged construction, and comfortable to carry. This bag is a slam dunk! -Chef Perry hautemealz.com
customer_reviews.author: Perry P. Perkins

customer_reviews.title: All in one!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. It can hold many knives, utensils, nick nacks and more stuff you can tuck in so many spaces
customer_reviews.author: B.Y.

customer_reviews.title: The Ultimate knife bag!!
customer_reviews.text: This knife bag is worth the price. Lots of compartments that make sense, velcro flaps that cover knife section, sturdy zippers it's got it all. After I bought mine (Orange) two other chefs at work bought one for themselves in black and green.
customer_reviews.author: Rob S.

customer_reviews.title: This bag is great! I can't believe it fits all of my ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great! I can't believe it fits all of my tools and then some but it does. It's a comfortable carry. It carries all of my blades, plus steel, scissors, diamond sharpening stone, leather strop paddle and more. Just purchased so in time I'll know the durability. As of right now, I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jurkovac

customer_reviews.title: So glad I dropped the extra money
customer_reviews.text: Hold all the tools I need and is very well made. So glad I dropped the extra money. All my past bags have fallen apart in less then a year.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Case is a great size. It fits all my knives
customer_reviews.text: Case is a great size. It fits all my knives, including my long knives and all tools perfectly. Storage is easy with all the separate compartments. It is very well constructed and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: It is very good product. I am very satisfied. Thanks to the manufacturer for the quality and of course to the dealer as well for good service.
customer_reviews.author: Levan

customer_reviews.title: Great product great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great travel case for chefs on the go. If you do a lot of catering, cooking for friends etc. This will keep you organized and is large enough to fit a large assortment of blades and utility items you'll need. Well made and sturdy. Great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan G Migita

customer_reviews.title: Must get for chefs
customer_reviews.text: It is big bag and I will not change it for a long time love it
customer_reviews.author: Ivan cleves

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice Chef's bag/roll... just as durable as those expensive knife rolls, with more than twice the room.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it. It is s replacement for a previous ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. It is s replacement for a previous knife bag that I had for a long time. Looking forward to many years of use.
customer_reviews.author: E. Rossi

customer_reviews.title: One serious knife case - love it
customer_reviews.text: This is the only case if you are serious about your knives. Room for a few gadgets and sharpeners and timers as well. This is not a toy. Pair this with the Ultimate Edge Blade Saver set and you are ready to travel with your cooking necessities.
customer_reviews.author: Robert James

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: this product was exactly what i was looking for, it hold all my knives, gadets and more. I would have liked to have seen the pockets be more expandable though that is my only gripe so far on this... time will tell how the wer and tear goes, but so far it has done me well instead of toting around a tool chest full of kitchen stuff.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: excellent bag, great quality
customer_reviews.text: excellent bag, great quality, little pricy though for what you get, will look elsewhere when this one needs to be replaced
customer_reviews.author: christopher d byrne

customer_reviews.title: Holds everything I need
customer_reviews.text: I carry everything but the kitchen sink in this case. Even my uniform, sans chef jacket, fits in the last compartment. I have a lot in there & there's room for more. From what I've seen over the years, this is the biggest case out there.
customer_reviews.author: J Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Love it, love it, love it!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two of these (my partner and I are both chefs) and we love them. It is by far my favourite knife bag. Ever. I especially love all the front pockets (which are surprisingly spacious) and the back mesh zip compartments. Can never have enough of those. It has a detachable shoulder strap which is fantastic. The longest knife I have in there is a serrated knife with a 30cm blade and it fits easily with about 2cm spare room. So much room for random bits and pieces. It's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Nat Berger

customer_reviews.title: Buy this knife bag!!
customer_reviews.text: As a Chef, I highly recommend this knife bag, it not only looks nice, it fits all my high end knives perfectly..
customer_reviews.author: Randy Don Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Good case.
customer_reviews.text: Longest knife it will fit is 13-14 inches. Barely fits my slicer.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for culinary school!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bag in my last year of pastry school and I LOVE it!! It fits everything I need, has lots of great compartments and love the army green color!!
customer_reviews.author: alwaysstarfish

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. As a military chef, this carries everything I virtually need for the kitchen. Additionally, the material of the bag takes a hell of a beating and still looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, needs deeper pockets
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this knife case, but only 4 stars because the pockets on the front are just not quite the right size anything with any thickness to them. Your cigarettes will be crushed if you start to fill it with knives. Other than that I have no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, plenty of slots to satisfy you knife fetish, it's my second one.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a professional chef and can fit in all of his knives and accessories in here. It is well made with lots of storage areas.
customer_reviews.author: La

customer_reviews.title: Stinky!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very roomy, holds a lot, it really is great, my only complain is the smell, I've aired it out, and now that I use it it smells less, but if you're picky about smells, ex. Cigarette smoke then the smell might bother you a lot. As far as the bag doing the job it's intended to do, it's a GREAT bag! Just stinky!
customer_reviews.author: RUBI L GARCIA

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of space and sturdy design
customer_reviews.text: I saw a co-worker with a similar bag and asked him about it. He loved his, and let me look it over. I purchased the Olive color because everyone else has black. The design is great and the webbing is well stitched and sturdy. I would recommend this to anyone. It missed 5 stars simply because of the cost - wish it were $20 cheaper. That being said, I would recommend this and would buy it again if given the choice.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce E Froman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case for my kitchen cutlery. Looks sharp, offers great protection, and fits a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K Holbrook

customer_reviews.title: Very well constructed, an ideal bag for my yoshihiro ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed, an ideal bag for my yoshihiro knifes and other kitchen tools. There is enough space even to save the whetstone.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto M. Battaglino

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Holds and protects all my steel and gear and doesn't take up too much room when open. You won't knock over your stack of clean towels when using this case get it
customer_reviews.author: claushaus

customer_reviews.title: Clean your game up
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bag!!! pictures cannot do this thing justice, I've now been able to condense down all my knives and one easy packets to take to work.
customer_reviews.author: CookIAN

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I love this knife case. It has so much room in it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: David Gaeta

customer_reviews.title: The Ultimate Edge #2001-EDOR Duluxe Chef Knife Case, Orange
customer_reviews.text: Excellent construction and design. I never thought I would pay $100 for a knife bag but I am not one bit remorseful. It is completely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Petrovich

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Worth the money! Keeps blades seperated and plenty of extra space!
customer_reviews.author: JDC

customer_reviews.title: case
customer_reviews.text: the case is right sizei needed to up grade for work in resturant. we not be sorry if order this. great case
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: my husband loves it.
customer_reviews.text: It works the way as it supposed to. My husband is a chef and need to carry his tools around and he loves it so much. All his friends were asking about the case.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Leon

customer_reviews.title: He keeps all the paraphernalia in his backpack to go to work
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to give my son a present that is cheff. He loved it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it....holds everything I need and then some! I have lots of pastry equipment and it holds it all!

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: This case is right on time . It has room for all of my knives, and room for most of my other small tools as well as ,having the large front pocket witch is perfect for the kindle tablet that. I keep work recipes and small. Library of cook books on There's also room for a chef coat .
customer_reviews.author: Charles Raymound Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The outer compartments really add storage space. The material is heavy so it's built to last. Much easier to use than a traditional knife roll.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie Faucher

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic knife bag for any professional chef
customer_reviews.text: A ton of space for all my knives and tools. A fantastic knife bag for any professional chef.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great knife bag
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this bag. So far everything I need is fitting in this bag. My only issue is a personal one. This bag is heavier than what I'm use to.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Bose

customer_reviews.title: My own new tool bag!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this bag. Gets compiments from other chefs at work.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Watts

customer_reviews.title: THERE'S SO MUCH ROOM!! It currently fits everything ...
customer_reviews.text: THERE'S SO MUCH ROOM!! It currently fits everything that I need, going into pastry + cookery classes. Hopefully it'll be with me for a very long time as I venture further into the culinary field!!
customer_reviews.author: Tuan

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Best knife bag I have ever owned; I have purchased two hard-case bags in the past and have had issues with clip breakage and nylon tearing due to the knife blades, respectively. This is a zippered bag and the knife blades don't reach down far enough to cut the nylon pockets. Has ample room to hold everything I need. Previous reviewers stated it is large enough to hold a notebook. It would have to be a small notebook, but is a compact bag with plenty of room for all of your professional kitchen needs. Looks great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Captmorgan

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag only thing I don't like are the zippers should be more heavy duty since the bag is 200$ but the bag is excellent quality, I'm a professional chef.
customer_reviews.author: Barry M.

customer_reviews.title: just what she wanted
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter who is a baking student. she did not want the usual black bag and needed the extra sleeves for baking and knives. she loves it

customer_reviews.title: the original one I had lasted about 8 years so ...
customer_reviews.text: the original one I had lasted about 8 years so I expect this one with the extra pockets to last even longer.

customer_reviews.title: ... who is a chef and he said it is excellent.
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my son who is a chef and he said it is excellent.

customer_reviews.title: The demensions were a little shorter then expected.
customer_reviews.text: The demensions were a little shorter then expected. Plenty of room for all the knives but a tight fit for the extras

customer_reviews.title: He is very pleased with this case and the knifes are transported in ...
customer_reviews.text: A Christmas present for one of my son's who is a Chef. He also caters therefore needs his Knifes when he is on the road. He is very pleased with this case and the knifes are transported in a safe manner.

customer_reviews.title: What a great bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: Im not much of a reviewer but this knife bag appears to be very high quality with good sturdy zippers and plenty of room for everyting you would want,The design is much more organized than the roll type knife cases. It should last for a good long time with minimal care.
customer_reviews.author: Todd A. Putz

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend who is a chef and he loves it, it is the only brand he likes because they last for so long and fit all his tools perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: It's a great bag, has a lot of room and pockets ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a great bag, has a lot of room and pockets and still not a big bulky bag. I really liked the bag, the only bad thing is that is came a little damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Alain T.

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't ask for more.
customer_reviews.text: This thing can hold everything you could possibly want. The knife compartments are well thought out, and the garnish/utility compartment has ample room for all your peripherals. It seems extremely durable and I'm very happy with my purchase.

customer_reviews.text: Excellent item. Plenty of storage. After using several different cases over the years, This is the best so far.
